font_family_options.label: Font family
font_family_options.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

language_support_rtl.label: Languages support RTL
language_support_rtl.info: Enter ISO language code, separate by comma. Leave blank to enable for all languages. [Check ISO language code](https://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php)

body_text_color.label: Body text
body_text_color.info: Used as foreground color on background colors.

primary_button_text_color.label: Text
primary_button_text_color.info: Used as foreground color on accent colors.

header_text_icon_on_transparent_color.label: Text and icon on header transparent

predictive_search_collection.label: Collection recommended
predictive_search_collection.info: Select a collection to recommend for customers

predictive_search_most_searched_keywords.label: Most searched keywords
predictive_search_most_searched_keywords.info: Recommend most searched keywords in your store to customers. For example: t-shirt, dress, black

show_product_rating.label: Show product rating
show_product_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/os20/themes-by-shopify/dawn/page-types#product-recommendations-show-product-rating)

color_swatches_trigger.label: Color swatch trigger
color_swatches_trigger.info: Define which is the color option. Separate by a comma. Eg. Color,Colour

header_image_swatches.content: You can also add color swatches to your product and collection pages using images. Please check [tutorial here](https://zest-docs.foxecom.com/theme-settings/product-options-swatches).

custom_colors.label: Custom colors
custom_colors.info: Valid format: red: #ff0000, separate by a comma

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

default_country.label: Default country
default_country.info: Default country for estimate shipping rates form. Enter country name, for example: United States. Refer to the country name [here](https://zest-docs.foxecom.com/theme-settings/cart#3.-country-code)

cart_recommendations_enable.label: Enable cart recommendations
cart_recommendations_enable.info: Dynamic recommendations are based on the items in your cart. They change and improve with time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

paragraph.content: Make sure that you have properly configured your [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping)

free_shipping_message.label: Message
free_shipping_message.info: Use {{amount}} to display progress towards free shipping.

free_shipping_limit.label: Minimum spend for free shipping
free_shipping_limit.info: Use round numbers. Exclude currency, symbols, and letters. [More info](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/free-shipping-rates#free-shipping-over-a-certain-value)

enable_confetti_effect.label: Enable confetti effect
enable_confetti_effect.info: Show when minimum spend is reached.

show_cookie_banner.label: Enable cookie banner
show_cookie_banner.paragraph: The cookie banner will automatically be shown to visitors when this is obliged. Make sure you have enabled 'Limit tracking for customers in Europe'. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/your-account/privacy/cookies#tracking-european-customers-and-gdpr-compliance)

design_mode.paragraph: Enable design mode to make cookie banner always displays during setup on the customize page.
design_mode.label: Design mode

displays.label: Displays on
displays.info: Enter the handles separate by comma

enable_slider_info.logo_list: Carousel shows only when the number of logos is larger than the number of images per row.
enable_slider_info.collection_list: Carousel shows only when the number of collections is larger than the number of columns.
enable_slider_info.blog_post: Carousel shows only when the number of posts is larger than the number of columns.
enable_slider_info.featured_collection: Carousel shows only when the number of products is larger than the number of columns.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave blank to hide the button

inline_product_count.label: Show product count same line with collection name

options__3.label: Logo center, menu left and right

sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header
sticky_header.info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll up.

header_carousel_settings.info: Applies when more than one announcement message

hide_on_page.label: Hide on pages
hide_on_page.info: Enter page handles separate by comma

paragraph.content: This section is only show on the desktop.

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

show_text_below.label: Show content below images on mobile

accessibility.label: Slideshow description
accessibility.info: Describe the slideshow for customers using screen readers.

collection_title.label: Collection title
collection_title.info: Leave blank to use collection's title

field_email.name: Field email
field_email.info: This field is required for the form to submit successfully.

field_message.name: Field message
field_message.info: This field is required for the form to submit successfully.

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

title.label: Tab name
title.info: Leave it blank to use collection name

button_settings.info: Show if collection has more products than shown.

heading.info: Heading required to display the menu.

header__1.info: Subscribers added automatically to your “accepted marketing” customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header__8.info: This selector only works with Shopify payment.

header__9.info: Display follow button for your storefront on the Shop app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

hero_height.label: Banner height
hero_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 2:3 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

show_text_below.label: Show content below images on mobile

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave blank to hide the button.

product.label: Product
product.info: This option is use only for Unbalanced layout.

image_height.label: Featured image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

note.name: Order note
note.paragraph: Allows customers add order note for seller.

paragraph.content: Add a description or image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)

collection.label: Collection
collection.info: Choose a collection to show this banner.

position.label: Desktop filter layout
position.info: Drawer is the default mobile layout.

sort.label: Sort collections by:
sort.info: Apply to Collection to show is 'All'

paragraph.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collections.

collections_per_page.label: Number of products per page
collections_per_page.info: It only works with collection to show as Selected

button_style.info: It only works with collection to show as Selected

title.label: Collection title
title.info: Leave blank to use Collections's title

settings.content: To display a rating, please install [Product Reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app by Shopify.

header.info: Show different countdown timer for individual product.

paragraph.content: Create a custom metafield for product with namespace and key: "foxtheme.countdown" and field type is Date and time. [Add metafield](/admin/metafields/product)

form_option_title.label: Size option title
form_option_title.info: Enter the option titles which you want to show Size guide button, separate with a comma

from_page.label: Content from page
from_page.info: Get size chart from selected page's content. This content will override content above.

custom.info: Show different size chart for specific collection or product.

paragraph_2.content: Create a custom metafield for product with namespace and key: "foxtheme.size_chart". [Add metafield](/admin/metafields/product)

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: When enabled, gift card products can optionally be sent to a recipient with a personal message.

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

ask_question.label: Show ask question form
ask_question.content: This form sends all submissions to the Sender email address of your store. You can change the sender email address in the [Store details](/admin/settings/general) settings page of your Shopify admin.

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

field_required.label: Required
field_required.info: If you use “Required” with a checkbox, then the checkbox will need to be checked for the customer to add the item to the cart.

show_at_checkout.label: Show at checkout
show_at_checkout.info: Uncheck this if you don't want the captured information to be shown in the order summary on the checkout pages.

options.label: Options
options.info: Each option in a new line

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

liquid.label: Content by Liquid
liquid.info: Accept HTML and custom Liquid. Example: {{ product.description }}

date_format.label: Date format
date_format.info: Example: %m/%d [Learn more about date format here.](http://strftime.net/)

paragraph.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations)

icon.info: Visible when collapsible tab is displayed.

enable_inventory_transfer.label: Show inventory transfer notice
enable_inventory_transfer.info: Learn how to create inventory transfers [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/inventory/transfers/create-transfer)

media_size.label: Desktop media size
media_size.info: Media is automatically optimized for mobile.

accessibility.label: Logo description
accessibility.info: Describe the logo for customers using screen readers.

paragraph.content: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

time.label: Ends time
time.info: Date format: YYYY/MM/DD HH:MM or YYYY/MM/DD HH:MM AA. [Learn more.](https://zest-docs.foxecom.com/theme-sections/countdown-timer#date-formats-accepted)

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

paragraph.content: Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/os20/themes-by-shopify/dawn/page-types#product-recommendations-show-product-rating)

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

autoplay.label: Autoplay
autoplay.info: Video will be muted automatically if autoplay enabled.

trigger_open.label: Trigger open automatically
trigger_open.info: The last option is only working on the desktop. On mobile, the popup will appear after page loaded.

header_design_mode.info: Enable design mode to make popup always displays during setup on the customize page.

header_teaser_button.info: Allows customers to open the popup manually.

form.name: Newsletter form
form.info: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify.[View customers list](/admin/customers)

code.label: Discount code
code.info: Give customers a discount code. [View discount codes](/admin/discounts)

settings.apply_button_info: This discount will be applied at checkout when customers click this button.

address.label: Address
address.info: Google Maps will find the exact location.

api_key.label: Google Maps API key
api_key.info: You'll need to [register a Google Maps API Key](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/map-section-api-key) to display the map

paragraph.content: Go to Theme settings -> Social media to update social links.
This section only shows on mobile. Please switch to mobile view.

collection.label: Collection
collection.info: If there is no collection selected, the button will be linked to "All" collection.

settings.paragraph: This tab will show the product's description

header.info: To display reviews widget, please install [Product reviews](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews) app by Shopify.

custom_description.label: Description
custom_description.info: Leave it blank to use the product description

button_label.info: This button will be redirected to the product detail page. Leave blank to hide the button

design_mode.paragraph: Enable design mode to make age verifier popup always displays during setup on the customize page.
design_mode.label: Design mode

age_verifier_content.heading: Heading
age_verifier_content.decline_paragraph: This content will display if the user does not meet the age verifier requirements.
